data.title: The Godfather : Part II - 1974
data.meta_description: An original 30x40 movie poster for Francis Ford Coppola's "The Godfather: Part 2", starring Al Pacino, Robert Duvall, Diane Keaton, Robert De Niro, John Cazale and Talia Shire. Free shipping within the UK. A small charge for shipping overseas. Buy this stunning 100% authentic movie poster.
data.text:
Condition: Good to Very Good.

Never folded!

Free shipping within the UK. A low flat rate for the rest of the world.

Size: 76 cm x 102 cm (30 in x 40 in).

A guaranteed original U.S. '30x40' movie poster for Francis Ford Coppola's fantastic 1974 sequel "The Godfather: Part 2", based on the characters created by Mario Puzo and starring Al Pacino, Robert Duvall, Diane Keaton, Robert De Niro, John Cazale and Talia Shire.

The sequel to 1972's epic serves as both a prequel and sequel to The Godfather. One story follows Pacino's Michael Corleone as he becomes head of the Corleone family. The other explores his father's (De Niro) journey from Sicily to New York mafia boss.

On release, the film polarised critics, but it is now considered one of the greatest films of the Twentieth Century. It would win Coppola the Best Picture and Best Director Oscars, with De Niro picking up the Best Supporting Actor Award. (He was one of three actors from the film nominated!)

It would be followed in 1990 by The Godfather Part 3.

This superb poster is a rarer '30x40' format. These posters were produced for use outside of a U.S. movie theatre and so were printed on thicker card-like paper stock. They were also, crucially, unfolded!

This example shows signs of its near fifty years. It has pin-holes around the edges and the bottom left corner in particular has been knocked around. HOWEVER, the central poster image has come through all of that pretty well and this poster will look fantastic framed and on display! (In our on-line images, we imagine it framed with a mount, with the mount sized to fit the central image, with the white border hidden from sight behind it.)

This really is a fantastic find!
